com.fluidops.iwb.widget.admin
Class WikiDiagnosticsWidget

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.widget.AbstractWidget<WikiDiagnosticsWidget.Config>
      com.fluidops.iwb.widget.admin.WikiDiagnosticsWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
Widget<WikiDiagnosticsWidget.Config>
public class WikiDiagnosticsWidget
extends AbstractWidget<WikiDiagnosticsWidget.Config>

Widget for diagnosing wiki pages, providing the functionality to identify broken widgets within Wiki pages. The following example configuration visualizes all warnings and errors occurring in bootstrapped (i.e., non-user modified) Wiki pages containing "Chart" in their URI: {{ #widget : com.fluidops.iwb.widget.admin.WikiDiagnosticsWidget | regexpFilter = '.*Chart.*' | pageTypeFilter = 'BOOTSTRAP' | logLevel = 'WARN' }} As another example, the configuration: {{#widget: com.fluidops.iwb.widget.admin.WikiDiagnosticsWidget | widgetStateRegexpFilter = '.*Display.*' | logLevel = 'Error' }} displays information about all errorneous pages containing widget information matching the substring .*Display.*.

Author:
msc
